content.question: Using correct units, interpret the meaning of ∫060 |v(t)| dt in the context of this problem. Approximate ∫060 |v(t)| dt using a left Riemann sum with the sub intervals indicated by the data in the table.

frqParts.text: Using correct units, interpret the meaning of ∫060 |v(t)| dt in the context of this problem. Approximate ∫060 |v(t)| dt using a left Riemann sum with the sub intervals indicated by the data in the table.

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Identify an appropriate mathematical rule or procedure based on the relationship between concepts (e.g., rate of change and accumulation) or processes (e.g., differentiation and its inverse process, anti-differentiation) to solve problems.
